column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I guess this means I'm officially a New York pizza guy. Lou Malnati's was right by our hotel and seems to be one of the places to get good Chicago deep dish pizza. We went for lunch on a weekday
column2: and it wasn't very busy. There was no hostess
column3: so we had to ask the bartender if we had to seat ourselves--he said no
column4: there should be a hostess. Finally she came out and immediately seated us. She was actually very nice.
